title: My hopes for 2019 ! Future reworks .
body:
https://i.imgur.com/ewUr8ls_d.jpg?maxwidth=640&shape=thumb&fidelity=medium

I hope Dr.Mundo and Mordekaiser will get reworked in 2019 , they need it the most and both of them have such a huge potential of becoming great assets for league . The pizza feet duo has priority now in my opinion , hope riot will take care of them this year and make two completely different champions , visual and gameplay . (:


Witch one is your favorite ? Dr.Mundo or Mordekaiser ?

Lets show some love xD any memories funny/nostalgic with this 2 champs to share ? xD or some ideas for them when they get reworked or something you wish Riot would keep after their rework for example - Dr Mundo muscular body and body color or Mordekaiser identity and one ability in particular ?
